title: StarCraft 2: NEW MAPS - Scarlett vs ByuN! (Best-of-3)
excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Scarlett (Zerg) versus ByuN (Terran). These games are played on the new maps that were recently announced for SC2.
